resources.string:
Hello, my name is Subhajit RuiDas , and I learn Android Development 

 My mission is to learn Android Development from this course and explore the Android Dev World . I am already the journey of Android Dev and by creating this project i will learn a little bit more.I will also learn Fullter Hybride development after this course. I am a btech 2nd year student and I am from Kolkata, name of my college is University of Engineering and management. My name is Subhajit RuiDas and my goal is to be good softwear engineer . I want to make lots of efficient projects after learning from this course. I am enjoying time while I am with coding .I targeted myself is to make outstanding projects for my resume .If get time after learning Android I will also learn backend development it is aim. I choose android dev bcoz it is interesting and unique. 

 Thankyou so much for being here.
